ai-patthana8.6:0.2_0: (This should be expanded in line with the teaching.)
ai-patthana8.6:1.1_0: No cause by the reason for the sake of debates.
ai-patthana8.6:1.1_1: For the sake of neither a cause nor reason for the sake of cause, causes and reason to stop trying to come up for the sake of the aggregates.
ai-patthana8.6:1.1_2: Not for the sake of a cause or reason for the sake of cause, nor for the sake of cause and reason.
ai-patthana8.6:2.1_0: Not because of cause or reason, the reason for the sake of cause, the reason for the sake of cause, causes and conditions.
ai-patthana8.6:2.1_1: Not because of cause or reason, the reason for the sake of cause, the reason for the sake of cause, that arises.
ai-patthana8.6:2.1_2: No cause for the sake of cause or reason for the sake of cause and reason.
ai-patthana8.6:3.1_0: Not because of cause or reason, the reason for the sake of cause, nor for the sake of cause, causes and reason for the sake of cause or condition.
ai-patthana8.6:3.1_1: Not because of cause or reason, the reason for the sake of cause, nor for the sake of cause, causes and reason.
ai-patthana8.6:3.1_2: Not for the sake of cause or reason for the sake of cause, nor for the sake of cause and reason.
ai-patthana8.6:6.1_0: For the sake of deference, not for the sake of a reason.
ai-patthana8.6:6.1_1: For the sake of deference, not for the sake of a reason.
ai-patthana8.6:7.1_0: For the sake of quality, not for the sake of the teaching.
ai-patthana8.6:7.1_1: For the sake of deference, not for the sake of a reason.
ai-patthana8.6:8.1_1: When the four continents have been sitting in the present life,
ai-patthana8.6:8.1_2: They were born in a womb, and from seven years old. Then they came upon the four for seven days. ...
ai-patthana8.6:9.1_0: The group of six are finished.
